title: Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (Financial support in respect of legal
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions 
Payment Scheme Act 2023 (Financial support in respect of legal costs and 
expenses) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited mother baby institution payment scheme act 2023 (financial support respect legal cost expenses) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (Financial support in respect of legal
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2023” means the Mother and Baby
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2023” means the Mother and Baby 
Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (Financial support in respect of legal 
costs and expenses) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 88 of 2024).
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2023 mean mother baby institution payment scheme act 2023 (financial support respect legal cost expenses) regulation 2024 (s.i no 88 2024)

title: Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (Financial support in respect of legal
heading: 3. Regulation 3(3) of the Regulations of 2023 is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(3) of the Regulations of 2023 is amended by the 
substitution, for “shall make payment directly to the applicant or, where 
applicable, the person to whom section 39(3) of the Act of 2023 applies.”, of the 
following: 

“shall make payment to – 

(a) 

the applicant or, where applicable, the person to whom section 
39(3) of the Act of 2023 applies, or 

(b) where the applicant or, where applicable, the person to whom 
section 39(3) of the Act of 2023 applies so directs in writing, to 
such legal practitioner as he or she specifies in the direction.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2025. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025.
